item.title: It's a New Year 2024-2025
item.description: (2024/08/25) Tranquilo Life really does begin at forty. Up until then, you are just doing research. — Carl Jung Meditation Stoic You Don’t Control What Happens, You Control How You Respond. The single most important practice in Stoic philosophy is differentiating between what we can change and what we can’t. Take good care of myself, both physically and mentally.
